roleset.name: homosexual
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Incidentally ; if you 're white , female , black , communist , jewish , whatever ; you can still not get married if you 're gay .

example.name: The Onion, of course.
example.text: [Peyton Manning]-1 Comes Out As [*-1] Gay For Football

roleset.name: cheery, festive, mirthful
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Sundays child is bonny and gay.

example.name: arg1, ADV
example.text: The party was gay and extravagant in appearance

role.descr: thing that is perceived negatively (may req. concatenation)

example.name: empty it, concatenation
example.text: I've seen people saying things like real vampires don't sparkle, vampires not sparkling was a fact, and that it was gay of them to sparkle.

example.name: concatenation, empty it
example.text: I would also like to add that it was gay of them to ask people to DL in order to help them set the record.
example.arg: [to ask people to DL in order to help them set the record][of them]
